answers.answer: A lot of time Gestational hypertension and preeclampsia start later in pregnancy and honestly ur so close to 37 weeks that's great! I started at 27 weeks an had to make it to 37 and had to be on med and it still got out of control. I wouldn't worry too much it's not good for you. I had to go twice a week for a while they may make you until you reach full term. Breathe and easier said than done try not to think about it it will drive you crazy.
Did u end up delivering at 37 weeks? @jesshat
Spotting after cervical checks are normal. I'm not sure about the blood pressure concern.

I had preeclampsia with my first. Had been having protien in my urine for several checkups but i guess bp hadnt been concern until one of my weekly checks and then they said i had it. I was induced 6 days before my due date.
Yes 37+3 and he's perfectly fine! Got pregnant when he was 3 months old and am now 18+5

question: Went to my regular check up yesterday I am on one a week appts since I am 36 weeks now.....my doctor checked my blood pressure and it was up she wants me back on Monday to see how it is doing I'm concerned BC I feel like it has been high lately....has anyone gotten preeclampsia in late pregnancy also she checked my cervix it is closed but I am spotting brownish blood not a lot is this normal
title: got checked yesterday
